column4: ufw, by default, will block every port. You won't get in unless you specifically open _some_ ports.
I'm no firewall expert by any means, but when I install gufw, and enable the firewall, I can't get in at any port.
Absolutely. That would be a seriously lousy server component if it didn't allow opening some ports. :)

Yes, that is the standard way of writing instructions. If you're doing something remotely, it is generally expected that you have some experience and understanding how that differs from the basic scenario.
